    • About Us

    Developer & Designer

    As the developers of this web app, our main goal is to provide our users with an engaging and informative way to visualize data on poverty rates in the Philippines. We believe that by presenting this data in a user-friendly format, we can increase awareness about the challenges faced by those living in poverty and inspire positive change. Our team is dedicated to creating a rich and interactive experience for our users, and we are committed to constantly improving and updating our web app to ensure that it meets their needs and expectations.
